Name: Bongo
Poem: Bongo the monkey lives in a tree, The happiest monkey you’ll ever see, In his spare time he plays the guitar, One of these days he will be a big star!

Name: Blizzard
Poem: In the mountains, where it’s snowy and cold, Lives a beautiful tiger, I’ve been told, Black and white, she’s hard to compare, Of all the tigers, she is most rare!

Name: Patti
Poem: Ran into Patti one day while walking, Believe me she wouldn’t stop talking, Listened and listened to her speak, That would explain her extra large beak!
